title: Introduction to Port Management
headline: This free online course covers the core concepts, regulations, techniques and skills necessary for port management.
description: Port management handles ships, containers, loading and unloading and customs procedures. This course will explore port management, including its main functions and features. We will also study the legal aspects of ports, including port safety and security. You will find information about public or private ownership. By the end of the course, you will have learned about various port functions and strategic port planning.
courseDescription:
Port management is in charge of ships, containers, merchandise transportation and customs procedures. This course delves into the main ideas and practices of port management. You will discover the main functions and features of ports. In addition, you will research information about the legal aspects of ports, including the importance of the flag, port and coastal state jurisdiction. What are the key elements of the UKâ€™s ports and shipping legislation? How can you benefit from analysing the international ships and port facility security codes? This course will help you answer these questions as it looks deeply into these topics.

We will then investigate port ownership, contrasting private or public. In addition, we will help you examine strategic port planning. Following that, we demonstrate the relevance of port safety and security and explore theories regarding environmental risk protection, such as scouring the causes of port ecological pollution. You will investigate the law regarding port equipment like container terminals and pallet systems. By the end, you will understand the general purpose of a cargo terminal and the characteristics of the various types of cargo.

If you want to become knowledgeable in port management, this course will show you how to apply essential principles and developmental processes. We present fundamental ideas and procedures so you can use them confidently in your workplace. This course is perfect for introducing you to port management. So enrol immediately and learn the essentials of this industry.
